name: DJ Kool
description: '''John W. Bowman Jr.''' (born March 20, 1958), better known by his [[stage name]] '''DJ Kool''', is an American rapper who produced several popular rap singles in the late 1980s. As a performer, he is best known for his 1996 hit single "[[Let Me Clear My Throat]]", the title track from his [[Let Me Clear My Throat (album)|1996 album of the same name]].
